member.name: SOCKADDR_STORAGE_LH
member.summary: The SOCKADDR_STORAGE structure is a generic structure that specifies a transport address.

member.name: SOCKADDR_STORAGE_LH.ss_family
member.summary: The address family for the transport address. For more information about supported address families, seeWSK Address Families.

member.name: SOCKADDR_STORAGE_LH.__ss_pad1
member.summary: A padding of 6 bytes that puts the__ss_align member on an eight-byte boundary within the structure.

member.name: SOCKADDR_STORAGE_LH.__ss_align
member.summary: A 64-bit value that forces the structure to be 8-byte aligned.

member.name: SOCKADDR_STORAGE_LH.__ss_pad2
member.summary: A padding of an additional 112 bytes that brings the total size of the SOCKADDR_STORAGE structure to 128 bytes.
